column6: THE BURNT OFFERING CONCLUSION Can T-Bolts guest-star, the Fixer, fix Cable? Can Cable fix himself without killing the Six Pack? And, can Deadpool kick the living #%$& out of Agent X and save all of them?!
column8: | inker:Udon Comics | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | writer:Fabian Nicieza | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller:Patrick Zircher
